title: Gamification-Integrated ICT Design for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and foundational statistical concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Requirement for personalized content tailored to individual learning paces. Consider design to prevent excessive competition when introducing gamification elements.

learning_goals: Learners apply mathematical concepts (e.g., ratios, graph interpretation) to digital tools (Excel, calculator apps) for real-life problem-solving with over 80% calculation accuracy.
Learners implement collaborative problem-solving strategies at least three times while performing team missions on gamification platforms (Quizlet, Kahoot).
Learners create data visualization reports using cloud-based collaboration tools (Google Sheets) in a BYOD environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
